testimonials.name: Emma K.
testimonials.text: OBSESSED with these!! the convertible design is literally genius - wore them as boots to dinner then pumps for dancing after. studs are so cute and heel height is perfect

testimonials.name: Sophia R.
testimonials.text: best purchase this year!! got so many compliments at my friend's wedding. the 4cm heel is comfy enough to dance all night and the studs add just the right amount of edge

testimonials.name: Madison L.
testimonials.text: ok but these are actually perfect?? wore them to brunch as pumps then converted to boots for shopping. faux suede looks expensive and i cant believe theyre only $59!!

testimonials.name: Ava M.
testimonials.text: love these sm but sizing runs slightly small - went up half a size and theyre perfect now. the convertible thing is so practical for work to happy hour transitions

testimonials.name: Chloe B.
testimonials.text: these boots are EVERYTHING the silver studs catch light so prettily and i get asked where i got them literally every time i wear them. see my pic!

testimonials.name: Isabella T.
testimonials.text: Absolutely love these boots! The convertible design means I'm basically getting two pairs for the price of one. Quality is amazing for the price point and they're surprisingly comfortable.

testimonials.name: Olivia H.
testimonials.text: never writing a review but HAD to for these!! wore them on a date and my bf couldn't stop complimenting them lol. kitten heel is so comfy i forgot i was wearing heels

testimonials.name: Mia S.
testimonials.text: the versatility is unreal!! office appropriate as pumps, then boots for dinner dates. faux suede is buttery soft and studs aren't too much or too little

testimonials.name: Zoe P.
testimonials.text: yall these are SO worth it omg. took them on a trip and saved so much suitcase space bc theyre basically 2 shoes in 1!! also they match everything

testimonials.name: Lily W.
testimonials.text: I'm usually skeptical about convertible shoes but these exceeded all expectations! The mechanism is secure, the studs look expensive, and they're actually comfortable. Been wearing them nonstop.

testimonials.name: Grace F.
testimonials.text: cant stop wearing these the heel height is perfect for someone who doesnt usually do heels. converted them in an uber before going into a party and it took 2 seconds

testimonials.name: Harper J.
testimonials.text: really cute and def worth the price!! only giving 4 stars bc i wish they came in more colors but the quality is amazing. studs stay secure even after wearing them a ton

testimonials.name: Aria C.
testimonials.text: best impulse buy ever!! saw them on my fyp and ordered immediately. wore them to a concert as boots then switched to pumps when my feet needed a break. 10/10 recommend

testimonials.name: Ella D.
testimonials.text: Such a smart design! I wear them to the office as pumps and then convert to boots for evening events. The faux suede material is great quality and the silver studs are the perfect accent without being too flashy.

testimonials.name: Luna G.
testimonials.text: obsessedddd these are so chic!! the studs give major rockstar vibes but still elegant enough for fancy dinners. also this is random but they photograph so well?? check my pic

testimonials.name: Scarlett V.
testimonials.text: finally found boots that dont kill my feet!! the 4cm heel is literally perfect and i love that i can switch to pumps when i want. quality is insane for $59

testimonials.name: Riley N.
testimonials.text: these boots are the definition of smart fashion!! wore them on a first date (as pumps) and switched to boots after for a walk. he was so impressed lmaoo. also theyre comfy af

testimonials.name: Nova A.
testimonials.text: Love love love!! Got them for a girls trip and they were perfect for everything - brunch, museums, dinner, clubs. The convertible design saved so much luggage space and the studs are gorgeous in photos!
